content:
As an AI language model, I can recommend some of the best websites to research the job market in St. Louis or Chesterfield. Some of these websites are:

1. LinkedIn - This is the world's largest professional network that enables job seekers to search for job openings, investigate companies and connect with hiring managers.

2. Glassdoor - It is a popular website among job seekers as it allows users to browse salaries, review companies, and read interview tips.

3. Indeed - It is one of the largest job search engines and it enables job seekers to search for job postings based on criteria like type, location, and salary.

4. Monster - It is a job search website that has been around for years and it provides job seekers with an extensive list of job opportunities in different industries.

5. St. Louis Post-Dispatch Jobs - The Post-Dispatch publishes job openings in the Greater St. Louis area on its website, which is a great resource for those seeking employment.

These websites offer a range of job postings for various industries, salary levels, and experience levels.
